findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions add(uint256 _allocPoint, …), set(uint256 _pid, …) and updateEmissionRate(uint256 _sharesPerSecond) in BaseShareRewardPool could invoke massUpdatePools() function that can fail due to block gas limit if the pool size is too big. Also, getTotalValues(), updateUsers() and updateAllUsers() in presaleDistributor use a loop to iterate through users list which could be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there will be a long user list.

findings.title: add() function issue (BaseShareRewardPool)
findings.description: If some LP token is added to the contract twice using function add, then the total amount of reward in function updatePool() will be incorrect.
